items.name: Chai Tea
items.description: A homemade brew of brook bond tea and spice made daily, not too sweet not too spicy and perfect balance. (8 oz)

items.name: The Momo Plate
items.description: Six steamed momos served with potato and a hot or mild dipping sauce.

items.name: The Combo Plate
items.description: Curried lentils and curried beef served over basmati rice with potato and 2 momos (includes hot or mild dipping sauce).

items.name: The Tashi Delek
items.description: Similar to the combo plate - without the momos

items.name: Rice Plate
items.description: Mild curried lentils served over basmati rice with potato, a simple vegetarian meal.
